title: 450-451: 'The Escapee Team in Trouble! the Forbidden Move: Venom Demon' and 'Come, Final Miracle! Break Through the Gate of Justice!'
author: Never Watched One Piece
description: A detailed first-time viewer's reaction to Episodes 450-451, praising Luffy's tactical awareness and the team effort required for the escape. The blogger notes Magellan's formidable nature and expresses devastation over Bon Clay's sacrifice in episode 451.

title: IMPEL DOWN! (Chapters 525-549)
author: The One Piece Virgin
description: Episode 26 of The One Piece Virgin podcast covers Chapters 525-549 of the One Piece Manga and the Impel Down Arc. Features guests Animak from AnimeUproar, Tekking101, Briggs from All Day Anime, and Nux Taku discussing the arc's events including the escape from Impel Down.
spoilerScope: Covers entire Impel Down arc through Chapter 549

title: Episode 450 - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: Comprehensive wiki page for Episode 450 including plot summary, character appearances, production credits, trivia, and manga chapter adaptation details.

title: Dante's Inferno Inspirations In One Piece: Impel Down Arc
author: University of Washington
description: Academic analysis of how the Impel Down arc draws inspiration from Dante's Inferno, examining the symbolism of the prison's multi-level structure mirroring the circles of hell and the themes of punishment and redemption.

title: One Piece: This Underappreciated Character Defeated 3 Future Emperors, And No One Cares
author: Game Rant
description: Article discussing Magellan's strength and how he defeated three characters who would become Emperors of the Sea (Luffy, Blackbeard's crew members), highlighting his underappreciated power level in the series.
spoilerScope: Contains spoilers for post-Impel Down events

title: One Piece â€“ Impel Down Arc Recap
author: TV Tropes Contributors
description: Comprehensive recap of the entire Impel Down arc from a narrative and tropes perspective, analyzing character moments, plot developments, and story themes.

title: "One Piece" Datsugoku Team Zettaizetsumei: Kinjite "Venom Demon" (TV Episode 2010)
author: IMDb
description: IMDb page for Episode 450 featuring ratings, cast information, user reviews, and production details. The episode has a rating of 8.9/10.
